law.catch_line: There is a $10 late filing fee for each day or part of a day, excluding a Saturday, Sunday, or holid...

text.section: There is a $10 late filing fee for each day or part of a day, excluding a Saturday, Sunday, or holiday, that a campaign finance report required by § 13-408 of this subtitle is overdue.
A late fee assessed under this section shall be paid from the personal funds of the incumbent.
